Name: LightWave
About the game: Lightwave is a platformer project gone full indie. Inspired by classic platformers and modern indie titles alike, this 2D pixel platformer features highspeed, fluid movement. Follow up the basics of platforming with advanced tech as you jump, slide and dash your way across the different Grids and overcome various obstacles. Unlock the RGBeam to unlock your true speed potential. Race your friends across the Grid with 4 player split-screen, or if your feeling up to the challenge, set the best times to top the leaderboards! Enjoy an original chiptune soundtrack full of up upbeat music to race to. Take on the Speedrun mode and complete the game in a single sitting as fast as you can.
Meta Title: LightWave: Feb 24, 2021, Noah Petrides and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on LightWave? Check out the release date (Feb 24, 2021), developer insights from Noah Petrides, and a complete game summary.
